projects.description_en: I developed a comprehensive platform for managing training operations, combining the latest technologies to ensure an exceptional and effective user experience. The site relies on PHP PDO with MySQL to ensure secure and fast connection with the database, and uses AJAX to load data dynamically without the need for page refresh. Additionally, I utilized the jQuery library to load content to the control panel instantly when buttons are clicked, enhancing the speed of user interaction. JavaScript was also employed to ensure smooth performance and flexible handling of events such as interactions with forms and interfaces, contributing to an overall improved user experience. Other features include support for easy import and export of Excel data, and the use of the DataTables library to enable quick data filtering and organization, along with interactive notifications via SweetAlert. This project reflects my expertise in using multiple technologies such as PHP, JavaScript, and AJAX to develop flexible and advanced web applications that meet the needs of modern businesses.

projects.description_en: I developed a comprehensive platform for managing trainee tasks with multiple permissions assigned to different types of users based on their needs. The platform includes three types of users: full-access System Administrator, medium-access Supervisors, and limited-access Trainees. It uses modern technologies such as JavaScript, AJAX, jQuery, and relies on JSON for data management via API, supporting import/export of Excel files and data organization using the DataTables library. The platform offers a flexible and smooth user experience, enabling efficient task management.
